title: Blubber
subtitle: A yml builder for wikibase-docker
prolog_description:
Blubber is a tool, which is supposed to setup your wikibase based on Docker in easy way.

Docker is kind of virtualisation, which encapsulate components or services inside containers. You can get more informations here.

If you want to setup docker now you can use this link.

Also you will need Docker-Composer, which is included in the Docker community edition, so most likely you won't need to install it separately. You can find Docker-Composer here.

You can run the whole setup or use directly the default settings:
invalid_port_integer: The given portnumber is not a valid integer
is_well_known_port: The given port is a well known port
port_is_in_use: The given port is allready in use
invalid_string: Only non empty strings are allowed
invalid_step: You have to use at least one container
components_question: Which components you want to install?
